title: Appleâ€™s privacy labels mysteriously vanish from the App Store on iOS and macOS
content:
Apple revealed its Privacy Nutrition Labels back in WWDC20. This iOS 14 feature forces (active) developers to provide in a clear way the kinds of data they collect from users. The App Store then displays these labels in the listing page of each app. This helps users decide whether they want to download a certain

The post Apple’s privacy labels mysteriously vanish from the App Store on iOS and macOS appeared first on XDA.
description: Apple's App Store privacy labels have mysteriously disappeared on both iOS and macOS. It's unclear when the company will address it.
